titleStmt.title: A true and impartial relation of a wonderful apparition that happen'd in the royal camp in Flanders, the beginning of this instant September, 1692, concerning King William / in a letter to a gentleman in London, from his friend, a captain in the King's camp.
titleStmt.author: Captain in the King's camp.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
